sources.title: Breakout (1959)
sources.description: Breakout is a 1959 British crime drama film directed by Peter Graham Scott and starring Lee Patterson, Hazel Court and Terence Alexander. The film followsÂ  a fraudster named Arkwright, who is serving a seven-year prison sentence. He enlists the help of his contact Chandler and escape expert George Munro to orchestrate a daring prison break using a rigged delivery van.

metadata.Plot: Drama set in an Italian prisoner of war camp during World War 2, where a group of British soldiers find their plans for escape thwarted by a mysterious traitor in their midst.
metadata.Writer: Bryan Forbes, Frank Harvey, Michael Gilbert
metadata.Actors: Richard Todd, Bernard Lee, Michael Wilding
